org.marinemc.game.system

Class MarineSecurityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.SecurityManager
      • org.marinemc.game.system.MarineSecurityManager

  • public class MarineSecurityManager
extends java.lang.SecurityManager
    A custom SecurityManager created for MarineStandalone. Will block pesky actions made by plugins.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MarineSecurityManager.PluginSecurityException
      SecurityException - Used to indicate illegal plugin activity

      A part of the MarineStandalone Security Suite

      Used to indicate internal classes that shouldn't be used by plugins - or alike
